summary: A dwemer followrer just for you!
descriptionHtml:
So, his dwemer guard wakes up one day and all his friends, family, race are all gone! He also noticed that the dwarven mechanics that guarded the cities have turn on him for some reason. In all this confuesion, he turns to the neared, friendliest living thing he can find. . .you!

UPDATE: Its not working for me so it won't work for you!! Don't download till It gets fixed, or you get bored and find a better mod to download!!!!
author: Dilpickle3899
